name: Codespace Environment
postCreateCommand:
echo '
=== Updating package lists ===' && sudo apt update && echo '
=== Upgrading packages ===' && sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt upgrade -y && echo '
=== Installing xvfb ===' && sudo apt install xvfb -y && echo '
=== Enabling corepack ===' && corepack enable && echo '
=== Installing corepack packages ===' && COREPACK_ENABLE_DOWNLOAD_PROMPT=0 corepack install && echo '
=== Setting up pnpm ===' && COREPACK_ENABLE_DOWNLOAD_PROMPT=0 pnpm setup && echo '
=== Installing patchright globally ===' && PNPM_HOME="/home/codespace/.local/share/pnpm" PATH="/home/codespace/.local/share/pnpm:$PATH" COREPACK_ENABLE_DOWNLOAD_PROMPT=0 pnpm add -g patchright && echo '
=== Installing patchright dependencies ===' && sudo env PATH="/home/codespace/.local/share/pnpm:$PATH" patchright install-deps && echo '
=== Installing npm packages ===' && PNPM_HOME="/home/codespace/.local/share/pnpm" PATH="/home/codespace/.local/share/pnpm:$PATH" COREPACK_ENABLE_DOWNLOAD_PROMPT=0 pnpm install && echo '
=== Setting up environment ===' && chmod +x scripts/setup-env.sh && node scripts/setup-env.js
